Reflexes.name: Reflexes
Reflexes.description: Measure of balance, limberness, quickness, and full-body motor abilities.

Presence.name: Presence
Presence.description: Measure of emotional strength, physical attractiveness, and personality.

Knowledge.name: Knowledge
Knowledge.description: Measure of strength of memory and ability to learn.

Perception.name: Perception
Perception.description: Measure of mental quickness and attention to detail.

Physique.name: Physique
Physique.description: Measure of physical power and ability to resist damage.

Coordination.name: Coordination
Coordination.description: Measure of hand-eye coordination and fine motor abilities.
